headline: How Leadership Shakeup and Unified Wealth Platform Strategy Will Impact Bank of New York Mellon (BK) Investors
summary: Earlier this week, Bank of New York Mellon Corporation announced a reshuffle of its executive leadership, appointing Adam Vos as Global Head of Wealth Solutions, Jim Crowley as Executive Vice Chair, and Laide Majiyagbe as Global Head of Markets to better align its wealth and markets businesses. By unifying BNY Pershing, the Wove platform, and BNY Archer Managed Account Solutions under one leader, BNY is aiming to offer more integrated, end-to-end support to advisors and institutions across...
